ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Bag of the Tinkers
ygData.msgSnippet: It is a 100% Weight Reducer & the only place I have known of it being is in Sol A at the Gnome Miners City. Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr 41rst Ranked
ygData.messageBody:
It is a 100% Weight Reducer & the only place I have known of it being is in
Sol A at the Gnome Miners City.

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
41rst Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

-----Original Message-----
From: Russ Wilcox [mailto:rwilcox@...]
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2000 8:19 AM
To: 'Fulcrum'; EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Bag of the Tinkerers


From: "Russ Wilcox" <rwilcox@...>

I found this bag available from a merchant in Ak'Anon for 5868plat. It has
a capacity of 10 slots. Anybody know what this is about?

I have seen the bag two different times however it is not there when I just
checked 5 minutes ago.

Unfortunately my notes do not specify *which* merchant in Ak'Anon but I
believe it was in the main square of the city (both times).

There was a quest given by warrior's guild where you get a 10-slot bag that
reduces weight of carried items; having not completed this quest I don't
know if this is the same bag but in any case I thought that quest gave a NO
DROP.

Any info appreciated.
